channel.title: [Minor Bug?] HUD Cold Damage Icon
channel.description: It is really minor, but the HUD damage type icon for cold (usually the snowflake icon) appears as a flame, as if it were fire damage. Particularly, I noticed it in the freezing room during "Apprehension" (map c2a3b). I'm not sure if the trigger_hurt is set to burn instead of freeze, if there is no icon for freeze damage yet and this is just a placeholder, or if it was simply a bug? (This is on the Steam version). ![2015-05-17_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://bxGHqs22VtBJIqTV8841jJnVv1X.jpeg)

item.title: [Minor Bug?] HUD Cold Damage Icon
item.dc:creator: Gaben_Freeman
item.description:
Yeah man, I had the same issue too. I hope they fix this, it really breaks the feel.

Read full topic

item.title: [Minor Bug?] HUD Cold Damage Icon
item.dc:creator: LithiumThunder
item.description:
It is really minor, but the HUD damage type icon for cold (usually the snowflake icon) appears as a flame, as if it were fire damage. Particularly, I noticed it in the freezing room during “Apprehension” (map c2a3b). I’m not sure if the trigger_hurt is set to burn instead of freeze, if there is no icon for freeze damage yet and this is just a placeholder, or if it was simply a bug? (This is on the Steam version).

2015-05-17_00001.jpg1920×1200 203 KB
